body: @Erkis  Because it's better to have it low quality than not at all?  Although I don't need it TO BE SPELLED OUT FOR ME ON EVERY PAGE; that's just trolling. BTW the "HIGH REZ OR GTFO" attitudes are probably why they're doing this.
Why tf does anyone just write over low quality on it. Like bro this isn't helping and if it's really low quality then why is it uploaded?
